values: To blend is to mix two or more things together so that they become one thing.
My wife blended together all of the ingredients to make a delicious stew.
n. 混合；掺合物 vi. 混合；协调 vt. 混合

- vt. & vi. (使)混合, (使)混杂
- n. 混合物

时 态:  
blended, blent  
blending, blends
